Key Match Events: Albert Gronbaek scored in the 36th minute for Denmark.
Poulsen scored in the 61st minute for Denmark.
Andersen received a yellow card in the 51st minute.
Kristansen received a yellow card in the 59th minute.
Lukic received a yellow card in the 70th minute.
Pavlovic received a yellow card in the 72nd minute.
Mitrovic received a yellow card in the 71st minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Denmark are under new management after the departure of Kasper Hjulmand following their last-16 exit to Germany at Euro 2024.
Lars Knudsen is currently in caretaker charge for Denmark.
Denmark beat Euro quarter-finalists Switzerland 2-0 on Thursday night.
Serbia's 0-0 draw with Spain on the opening night benefits Denmark.
Serbia have stuck with manager Dragan Stojkovic despite a poor showing at the Euros.
